entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: High.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places, mainly along the coast. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A cold front brings a shower or two to the road late Friday morning, possible falling as snow about the summit. Less than 1 cm may accumulate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: One or two showers may affect the road Thursday afternoon or early evening, but less than 1 cm of snow may accumulate about the road above 900 metres. Shower activity increases again early Friday morning, ahead of a cold front late Friday morning. A further 4 to 8 cm may accumulate during this time above 800 metres, mostly with the front.
